summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1460, for the improvement of North 43rd Street, and East 43rd Street, from Stone Avenue to Brooklyn Avenue; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle by constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden cross walks under Ordinance No. 15763 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
